a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rates from violence in non-state societies
Deaths from violence per 100,000 people in a given population, per year. Non-state societies are those that
consist of a chiefdom, tribe, or clan.
!Kung Bushmen (Kalahari), before the establishment of a state
!Kung Bushmen (Kalahari), after the establishment of a state
Data source: Bowles, S. (2009), Gat, A. (2008), Knauft, B. M. et al (1987), Keeley, L. H. (1996), Pinker, S. (2011), and Walker, R. S., &
